title: The Villainous Lady Aims to Overthrow the Heroine ~Fight!~ - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Shoujo
tags: Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Honest Protagonist   Lack of Common Sense   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Rivalry   Short Story   Stubborn Protagonist   Villainess Noble Girls   Wealthy Characters
author: Aska
description:
Belfreya Alunst is a typical villainous lady. She is now entering the school with the soul of an ultimate rival for the sake of the battle towards the summit with the heroine. This is basically what this story is all about.

This is the sequel of the short story [The Villainous Lady Aims to Overthrow the Heroine].>
